titleStmt.title: Twenty-two select colloquies out of Erasmus Roterodamus pleasantly representing several superstitious levities that were crept into the Church of Rome in his days.
Colloquia. Selections. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

editionStmt.edition: The second impression corrected and amended : with the addition of two colloquies to the former /

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Bentley ..., and R. Sare ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
